issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

comments.body:
This removes the copy fix, instead calling reset on codec every time.
Also maintains the 0-byte check before it's fixed in the direct decompressor.
[~gopalv] can you take a look?

LGTM - +1

Added to the weekend tests, I'll do a heapdump and check if there are any unreferenced codecs in the heap.
